nodes.text: Star Wars Adventures 18 is the eighteenth issue of the canon comic book anthology series Star Wars Adventures. The issue is comprised of the stories "Raiders of the Lost Gundark," by Delilah Dawson, and "Flight of the Falcon, Part 5: Grand Theft Falcon," by Michael Moreci. Star Wars Adventures 18 was published on February 20, 2019 by IDW Publishing.
Padmé Amidala joins Jar Jar Binks on a quest to recover a legendary Gungan artifact. Uh oh! This one is going to be very messy! Plus, Gannis Ducain details his time with the Millennium Falcon!
